metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3829 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: Off-by-one error in the MPEG4Extractor::parseChunk function inMPEG4Extractor.cpp in libstagefright in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48I allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service(integer overflow and memory corruption) via crafted MPEG-4 covr atoms witha size equal to SIZE_MAX, aka internal bug 20923261.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
